actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, so as to extend from 1 to 3 years the period that a member of the uniformed services has following retirement to select his home for purposes of travel and transportation allowances under such title.

summary.text: Extends from one to three years the period that a member of the uniformed services has following retirement to select his home for purposes of travel and transportation allowances. (Amends 37 U.S.C. 404 (c), (g))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, so as to extend from 1 to 3 years the period that a member of the uniformed services has following retirement to select his home for purposes of travel and transportation allowances under such title.
